main_definition: Unceasing or boundless, without apparent limits.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Continuing forever without stopping or ending.
meanings_and_examples.example: The desert sun beat down on them as they walked through what seemed to be an endless expanse of sand.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Never-ending in length, duration, or quantity.
meanings_and_examples.example: She spent hours scrolling through her social media feed, which felt like it was endless.

meanings_and_examples.definition: With no visible boundaries; infinite in scope or extent.
meanings_and_examples.example: The artist's imagination gave birth to an endless array of fantastical creatures and landscapes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Constantly available, accessible at any time without interruption.
meanings_and_examples.example: With the advent of technology, information has become more easily accessible than ever before - almost as if it's endless.
